java/liquibase/change/RenameViewChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RenameViewStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.View;
00008 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.Arrays;
00015 import java.util.HashSet;
00016 import java.util.Set;
00017 
00021 public class RenameViewChange extends AbstractChange {
00022     private String schemaName;
00023     private String oldViewName;
00024     private String newViewName;
00025 
00026     public RenameViewChange() {
00027         super("renameView", "Rename View");
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getOldViewName() {
00039         return oldViewName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setOldViewName(String oldViewName) {
00043         this.oldViewName = oldViewName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public String getNewViewName() {
00047         return newViewName;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public void setNewViewName(String newViewName) {
00051         this.newViewName = newViewName;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00055         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(oldViewName) == null) {
00056             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("oldViewName is required", this);
00057         }
00058         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(newViewName) == null) {
00059             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("newViewName is required", this);
00060         }
00061 
00062     }
00063 
00064     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00065         return new SqlStatement[]{new RenameViewStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getOldViewName(), getNewViewName())};
00066     }
00067 
00068     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00069         RenameViewChange inverse = new RenameViewChange();
00070         inverse.setOldViewName(getNewViewName());
00071         inverse.setNewViewName(getOldViewName());
00072 
00073         return new Change[]{
00074                 inverse
00075         };
00076     }
00077 
00078     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00079         return "View " + oldViewName + " renamed to " + newViewName;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00083         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00084         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00085             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00086         }
00087         element.setAttribute("oldViewName", getOldViewName());
00088         element.setAttribute("newViewName", getNewViewName());
00089 
00090         return element;
00091     }
00092 
00093     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00094         View oldView = new View();
00095         oldView.setName(oldViewName);
00096 
00097         View newView = new View();
00098         newView.setName(newViewName);
00099 
00100         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(Arrays.asList(oldView, newView));
00101     }
00102 
00103 }
